channel.title: Bookmarks on Jashua R. White

item.title: Toolkit
item.description: Below is my technology stack of hardware, software, languages, libraries, tools, and various resources that’ve I’ve grown to love and strive to master. Workstations Apple MacBook Pro 13 Retina i5, 8GB RAM, 256 GB Mini ITX Gaming Desktop, 16GB Ram, 256 GB, i3 3.7GHz, RX 470 (Windows 10) Text Editor Atom (Mac/Windows) HTML Style guide: Code Guide by @mdo CSS Preprocessor: Sass Naming Conventions: BEM JavaScript Frontend Frameworks: AngularJS, Backbone.
